exceptions.tactic: destruct Zp_eq_dec with u nat2Zp as [Heq | Hneq].
exceptions.exn: In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 u : Z_Zp The term "nat2Zp" has type "nat -> Z_Zp" while it is expected to have type "{x : nat | x < p}".
In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 u : Z_Zp Unable to unify "rem ?M1462 ?M1460 = ?M1462" with "1 <= p".
In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 u : Z_Zp Unable to unify "p <> 0" with "0 < p".
[Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
The reference Heq was not found in the current environment.
In environment p : nat Hp : p <> 0 u : Z_Zp Unable to unify "Zp" with "u".
[Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: destruct Zp_eq_dec with u nat2Zp as [Heq | Hneq]. - exists 0. split. + apply rem_lt. apply Hp. + rewrite Heq. reflexivity. - exists 1. split. + apply rem_lt. apply Hp. + rewrite Heq. reflexivity.
